product_name: Bending Branches Angler Ace Kayak Paddle
long_description: A light kayak paddle for serious anglers, the Bending Branches Angler Ace makes the whole trip seem easier and more fun thanks to its lightweight carbon shaft and built-in hook retriever. Carbon shaft and carbon-reinforced nylon blades make for an easy trip to your favorite hot spots. Built to free a snagged hook, a small groove in paddle blade helps rescue lures, pull in the big catch, and get the line out of snags like trees and rocks.
short_description: A light kayak paddle for serious anglers, the Bending Branches Angler Ace makes the whole trip seem easier and more fun thanks to its lightweight carbon shaft and built-in hook retriever.
